abstract: zlancer : the people powered freelance platform on the ethereum blockchain .
article: zlancer is a platform which will revolutionise the way freelancers find jobs , ease the process and increase networking and cooperation between clients , recruiters and freelancers . what is a freelance platform ? to keep things simple , a freelance platform automates the process of job applications between employers , recruiters , and job seekers that work on their own -- e. g . a company is looking to make a website for their new awesome project . the sign in to a platform and get paired up with a freelance web developer looking for a job . happy times !

freelancers can submit jobs of their choice on the zlancer platform to find a perfect fit with recruiters from any business looking to benefit from their expertise . zlancer will act as a service that leverages powerful technology within a network to match freelancers with their dream jobs in a quick and efficient manner . zcashgold services will consist of a large range of locations and jobs with ease-of-use web design . large amounts of people are unemployed , and struggle to find positions to earn a living . the majority of people that work also feel undervalued . the global economy is suffering from lack of potential , poor wages and unemployment .

as the population is increasing , it is harder to get jobs and therefore many people are wasting valuable energy trying to be recruited for the jobs they dream of doing . it 's time to find a solution . without recruiters , expensive fees , time and wasted effort . it 's time for transparency . it 's time for a revolution . zcashgold will be creating zlancer to facilitate a people powered platform for freelancers to find their dream jobs . what is zlancer ? zlancer is a freelance platform built on the ethereum blockchain , with a vision to stand as a self-regulated platform to facilitate jobs and projects for contractors .

by disrupting the market effectively , customers and freelancers will benefit from transparency and ease of use . zcashgold will act as a payment system to facilitate instant peer to peer transactions at low cost . the platform called zlancer will act as a digital ecosystem for freelancers to get hired , apply for jobs and instantly be linked to experts and businesses for their services . the zcg tokenzcg represents how many coins an investor holds as part of a business , like shares in a company . as shareholders , investors will benefit from the company 's revenue as its value incrementally and organically increases with its usability .

the beautiful part of this project is that there is only 2,000,000 zcg tokens in circulation . these are available on coinexchange . io and etherdelta , with more announcements in the near future . finding your dream jobgood news -- there is no need to fully understand the blockchain . you can simply conduct a job search in our platform and build a reputation for yourself as a freelancer . as your profile status increases , you 'll be matched with more suitable contacts and customers will request to use your wonderful expertise . the z team focus on simplicity .

this is a core element of how things are run . we are people powered . we grow together . how can i get something done for me ? can it get any better ? sure can ! if you 're a company in need of a website for example , create your profile on zlancer and sit back , relax and wait for freelancers to come running to you with fabulous offers ! contact is easy and direct . no more need for recruiters ! solving the problem . some problems that are lurking in the freelance market have had enough .

it 's time to find the solution to the following : paymeny decline prevention . ever had an agreement with someone who backed away last minute ? on zlancer , he/she wo n't be able to due to the power of smart contracts ! once the user justifies the agreement , the freelancer will do the job and the payment will be triggered at the speed of light ! awareness of fake reviews received due to blockchain transparency . tired of central authority figures in a business controlling you ? it 's time to do it all on your own .

zlancer is the way to manage your own costs , projects , work in a happy and efficient manner . in summary `` zcashgold solving a worldwide problem for freelancers ! less fees , no tax , no middle man . '' it 's quick and it 's safeit 's got a 2,000,000 circulating supplyit 's fully transparent and easy to useit 's an erc20 token , so minimal fees ! it 's a people powered platform , with a great community . come join the revolution . for more information visit us on media .
